text:
@itvnews The question can only be answered in court. ALL Muslim deaths supposedly from Covid-19 happened in the hospitals, at the hands of 'healthcare workers' & no member of family allowed. The NHS should be sued for medical ethnic cleansing.

#NHSCovidCrimes #NHSEugenics #NHSMurders
